SEARCH
Package org.opengrok.indexer.history

Class Annotation

java.lang.Object
org.opengrok.indexer.history.Annotation
public class Annotation extends Object
Class representing file annotation, i.e., revision and author for the last modification of each line in the file.

    • getRevision

      public String getRevision(int line)
      Gets the revision for the last change to the specified line.
      Parameters:
      line - line number (counting from 1)
      Returns:
      revision string, or an empty string if there is no information about the specified line

    • getRevisionForDisplay

      public String getRevisionForDisplay(int line)
      Gets the revision for the last change to the specified line in a format that may be specifically for display purposes.
      Parameters:
      line - line number (counting from 1)
      Returns:
      revision string, or an empty string if there is no information about the specified line

    • getRevisions

      public final Set<String> getRevisions()
      Gets all revisions that are in use, first is the lowest one (sorted using natural order).
      Returns:
      set of all revisions the file has

    • getAuthor

      public String getAuthor(int line)
      Gets the author who last modified the specified line.
      Parameters:
      line - line number (counting from 1)
      Returns:
      author, or an empty string if there is no information about the specified line

    • isEnabled

      public boolean isEnabled(int line)
      Gets the enabled state for the last change to the specified line.
      Parameters:
      line - line number (counting from 1)
      Returns:
      true if the xref for this revision is enabled, false otherwise

    • getFileVersion

      public final int getFileVersion(String revision)
      Translates repository revision number into file version.
      Parameters:
      revision - revision number
      Returns:
      file version number. 0 if unknown. 1 first version of file, etc.

    • getFileVersionsCount

      public int getFileVersionsCount()
      Returns:
      Count of revisions on this file.

    • getColors

      public Map<String,String> getColors()
      Return the color palette for the annotated file.
      Returns:
      map of (revision, css color string) for each revision in getRevisions()
